name: 247Games.com Clean Ad-Suppression
description:
Removes the sidebar ad-banners and maximizes the game-content to the window-size, giving it a more cleaner look, and making it more playable when using smaller window-sizes. 

Works for most game-websites by 247games.com, like: 247blackjack.com, 247solitaire.com, 247sudoku.com, 247mahjong.com, 247hearts.com, 247spades.com, 247checkers.com, 247roulette.org, 247videopoker.org, 247slots.org, 123freecell.com; including their Holiday-special websites like (for example) christmas-solitaire.com, valentinesdaymahjong.com, etc.

Please provide feedback if you want your favourite 247-game url added to the list if it isn't already.
css:
@-moz-document domain("247mahjong.com"),
               domain("247solitaire.com"),
               domain("247sudoku.com"),
               domain("247backgammon.org"),
               domain("247hearts.com"),
               domain("247freecell.com"),
               domain("247bridge.com"),
               domain("247blackjack.com"),
               domain("247spades.com"),
               domain("247checkers.com"),
               domain("247roulette.org"),
               domain("247videopoker.org"),
               domain("247slots.org"),
               domain("123freecell.com"),
               domain("cardgamesolitaire.com"),
               domain("christmas-solitaire.com"),
               domain("halloween-mahjong.com"),
               domain("solitairehalloween.com"),
               domain("mahjongeaster.com.com"),
               domain("spiderettesolitaire.net"),
               domain("yukonsolitaire.net"),
               domain("cincodemayosolitaire.com"),
               domain("stpatricksdaymahjong.com") {

body, #main                         { padding-bottom: 0 !important; overflow: hidden }

div.left, div.right,
#content, #header, #footer,
.social-below                       { display: none !important }

#main, #feature-holder        { border: 0 !important }

.desktop .middle                  { left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); min-width: 900px }

}
